description.oldValue:
When creating a message post in a team channel, users will be able to notify owners of the team all at once by mentioning “@Team Owners”, removing the need to mention each Team Owners individually. “Team Owners” is automatically grouped and does not require any manual maintenance.
GA date: May CY2022
description.newValue:
When creating a
message post in a team channel, users will be able to notify owners of the team
all at once by mentioning “@Team Owners”, removing the need to mention each
Team Owners individually. “Team Owners” is automatically grouped and does not
require any manual maintenance.
